!!!!THANKS FOR CHOOSING CYBRARIAN 1.0 LIBRARY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM!!!!!

TO RUN THE APPLICATION ON WINDOWS: LOCATE TO THE DIST DIRECTORY AND EXECUTE THE "Click_to_run(WINDOWS).bat" FILE

TO RUN THE APPLICATION ON MAC&LINUX: LOCATE TO THE DIST DIRECTORY AND OPEN THE TERMINAL ON THE CURRENT DIRECTORY AND EXECUTE THE FOLLOWING COMMAND- "./Click_to_run(LINUX_MAC).sh" WITHOUT
THE QUOTES
